server.network module¶

Network server file.

class server.network.MUDChatServer(host='0.0.0.0', port=5555)¶

Базовые классы: object

Main game server class handling network connections and game logic.

async broadcast(message, exclude_username=None)¶

Broadcasting.

Параметры:

  • message – mess

  • exclude_username – initiator, default None.

async handle_client(reader, writer)¶

General handling func.

Параметры:

client – processing client.

async remove_client(username)¶

Disconnect user function.

Параметры:

username – whom to disconnect.
